description: Templates for Blight-corrupted creature encounters. Matched by keywords: blight, corrupted, infected.

templates.fragmentContent: Tissue samples reveal extensive cellular mutation. The corruption spreads in fractal patterns, each branch terminating in crystalline nodules that pulse with faint light.
The creature's eyes retained a disturbing awareness even after death. Markings on the skull suggest this one was intelligent before the Blight claimed it.
Residual Aetheric contamination lingers in the remains. The corruption signature differs from natural Blight patterns, suggesting this specimen was deliberately exposed.
